ygData.subject: Re: You're all crazy!
ygData.msgSnippet: LoL, you re not a very bright one.  I m not controlling him.  You moving out of the way would be moding.  And it doesn t really matter if you re ready to loose

LoL, you're not a very bright one.  I'm not controlling him.  You moving out 
of the way would be moding.  And it doesn't really matter if you're ready to 
loose Suukie.  I've lost a few of my characters before I wanted to, but I 
didn't whine.  And blowing apart Suukie's gut wouldn't necessarily kill him.  
So stop moding, and shut up.  The barrel is less than millimeter away, if 
Suukie had done the same to any of my guys, unless he was aiming at shield or 
they had a personal energy shield, I couldn't do a dang thing about it.
